name: Fisher Bear
description:
Do you daydream about relaxing by the water with a fishing pole in your hands waiting for the next bite? Have you ever wanted to be a bear? Have you ever wanted to be a bear relaxing by the the water with a fishing pole in your hands waiting for the next bite?

Well, with Fisher Bear you can!

With four zones to fish in, 100 different and silly fish to catch, and a day/night cycle and date system that uses real world time based on your phone's clock and calendar, there will always be something to catch! Simple and easy controls as well as an auto-save system, make the game perfect for when you have a few spare minuets that you want to spend catching fish!

Hope you enjoy!

-The WhyNot? team
